title: German court sends VW execs to prison over Dieselgate scandal
author: Tomte
aiHeadline: VW execs learn the hard way that 'green' isn't just a color anymore—German court sends them to prison for Dieselgate scandal.

title: Google shared my phone number
author: luu
aiHeadline: Google proves once again that it knows everything about you, including how to accidentally share your phone number.

title: Hacker News now runs on top of Common Lisp
author: Tomte
aiHeadline: Hacker News goes retro, proving that even old-school Lisp can still kick ass in the modern world.

title: CSS Minecraft
author: mudkipdev
aiHeadline: CSS Minecraft: Because who needs pixels when you can build an entire world with just brackets and semicolons?

title: Duolingo CEO tries to walk back AI-first comments, fails
author: Improvement
aiHeadline: Duolingo CEO learns that walking back AI comments is as easy as learning a new language—spoiler: it's not.
